title: Ann Arbor, Michigan
summary: Ann Arbor is a city in the U.S. state of Michigan and the county seat of Washtenaw County.[5]  The 2020 census recorded its population to be 123,851,[2] making it the fifth-largest city in Michigan. It is the principal city of the Ann Arbor Metropolitan Statistical Area, which encompasses all of Washtenaw County. Ann Arbor is also included in the larger Greater Detroit Combined Statistical Area.
